archimate:Resource.name: Solution Platform
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB supports the software environment in which the Solution Components and Solution Building Blocks deploy and run. Examples would be Java Virtual Machines (JVMs) hosting a Service Container Solution Building Block, or a CICS environment.

properties.value: This ABB supports the software environment in which the Solution Components and Solution Building Blocks deploy and run. Examples would be Java Virtual Machines (JVMs) hosting a Service Container Solution Building Block, or a CICS environment.
